text: Daigo Watanabe (born 3 December 1984) is a Japanese football player. He plays for Kyoto Sanga. He has 2 younger brothers, Kazuma Watanabe and Mitsuki Watanabe, who are both footballers. ==Club career statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup Total Total 2003 Kyoto Sanga FC J1 League 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 2004 J2 League 18 0 0 0 - 18 0 2005 4 0 1 0 - 5 0 2006 J1 League 18 0 1 0 5 1 24 1 2007 J2 League 47 3 1 0 - 48 3 2008 J1 League 34 3 2 0 5 1 41 4 2009 20 2 0 0 6 0 26 2 2010 28 1 2 0 5 0 35 1 2011 Omiya Ardija 23 1 1 0 2 0 26 0 2012 31 3 4 0 5 1 40 4 2013 33 5 2 0 4 0 39 5 2014 27 1 3 0 5 0 35 1 2015 J2 League 34 2 1 1 - 35 3 2016 Busan IPark KL Challenge 5 0 0 0 0 0 5 0 2016 Kamatamare Sanuki J2 League 19 1 1 1 - 20 2 2017 38 2 0 0 - 38 2 2018 23 0 0 0 - 23 0 Career total Career total Career total 402 24 22 2 37 3 461 29 ==References== *Kyoto Sanga Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Nagasaki Prefecture
